step.cmd: Select an existing user defined tier and press Delete or Backspace, or right-click on a tier and choose Delete tier <tier name>.
step.stepresult: This action will generate a dialog asking you to confirm that you would like to delete the tier and informing you that this action cannot be undone. Default Phon tiers (such as Orthography, IPA Target, Notes, etc.) cannot be deleted. If you do not wish to use one or more of these tiers, you can make them invisible following instructions at .

step.cmd: If you are unsure about removing the tier, click Cancel. If you would like to continue and remove the tier and all its contents, click Ok.
step.stepresult: The user defined tier will no longer appear in the Tier Management or Record Data views for this session.
